p: The pancreatic lipase activity was measured titrimetrically with a pH-Stat (Metrohm, Switzerland) at pH 8.5 and 37 °C using olive oil emulsion as substrate and in the presence of 4 mM NaDC and Turkey pancreatic colipase previously purified according to Rathelot and colleagues [ 29]. One lipase unit corresponds to 1 μmol of fatty acid released per minute.
